title: Are Key Workers About To Quit? (with Stephen McCabe)
itunes:title: Are Key Workers About To Quit? (with Stephen McCabe)
description:
The U.K. has suffered its worst day of the pandemic yet again.

And despite figures putting the West Midlands among the best areas for vaccine roll-out, Labour MP Steve McCabe tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing it's not going as smoothly in his constituency of Birmingham Selly Oak.

Plus, have key workers had enough? Chris Curtis from Opinium shares his research on how much of a toll the pandemic is taking.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
